verses.translation: By the sky, (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;
By the promised Day (of Judgment);
By one that witnesses, and the subject of the witness;-
Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire),
Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:
Behold! they sat over against the (fire),

verses.arabic: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And they witnessed (all) that they were doing against the Believers.

verses.arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: And they ill-treated them for no other reason than that they believed in Allah, Exalted in Power, Worthy of all Praise!-
verses.transliteration: Wama naqamoo minhum illa anyu/minoo billahi alAAazeezi alhameed

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Him to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness to all things.
verses.transliteration: Allathee lahu mulku assamawatiwal-ardi wallahu AAala kullishay-in shaheed

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا۟ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا۟ فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers, men and women, and do not turn in repentance, will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena fatanoo almu/mineenawalmu/minati thumma lam yatooboo falahum AAathabujahannama walahum AAathabu alhareeq

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّـٰتٌ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: For those who believe and do righteous deeds, will be Gardens; beneath which rivers flow: That is the great Salvation, (the fulfilment of all desires),
verses.transliteration: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati lahum jannatuntajree min tahtiha al-anharu thalikaalfawzu alkabeer

verses.translation: Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.
It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).
And He is the Oft-Forgiving, Full of Loving-Kindness,
Lord of the Throne of Glory,
Doer (without let) of all that He intends.
Has the story reached thee, of the forces-
Of Pharaoh and the Thamud?
And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!
But Allah doth encompass them from behind!
Nay, this is a Glorious Qur'an,
(Inscribed) in a Tablet Preserved!
